name: Pike Cube
description:
WASD - Move

Mouse - Aim

Click - Shoot

Inspired by atari games and the ones predating them,pike cube is a simple little game where you attempt to destroy cubes falling from the sky. It is an ultraretro game that can provide you with quite a bit of entertainment. The simple highscore game only faces you with one challenge. Destroy as many pesky blocks as possible!!

play mobile version in browser here:  https://maplemill.itch.io/pcmobile

password: pikecube
